description: This course provides students with the opportunity to gather insights and develop skills in the writing of creative prose, poetry, and/or drama. Literary selections are often used as models and discussions of craft set the stage for the workshopping of student writing. Prerequisite: FYW or equivalent.
name: Creat Wrtg: Fict/Poet
notes: This course has class year limits.
title: Creative Writing: Fiction and Poetry
